properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 11 at 9:07PM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the Sucarnoochee River At
Livingston...

.Rises continue along the Sucarnoochee River following the recent
heavy rainfall...and a flood warning remains in effect at Livingston.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Sucarnoochee River At Livingston.
* until further notice...or until the Warning is cancelled.
* AT 8:30 PM Tuesday the stage was 21.9 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Minor flooding is forecast.
* Flood stage is 18 feet.
* Forecast...The river will continue rising to near 24.5 feet by
early Thursday afternoon then begin falling.
* Impact...At 24 feet...Some secondary low-lying roads and a few
yards begin to flood in southeast Livingston.
* Impact...At 25 feet...Some homes in southeast Livingston flood and
a few evacuations are necessary.  Considerable flooding of
low-lying agricultural lands occurs.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Wednesday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
